shortDescription.value: Create a graphical representation of your Firestore schema.

longDescription.value: I've largely been documenting my Firestore schema for projects in Figma but I found that because Figma is a freehand design tool, the graphics are usually messy and inconsistent. I set out to create an app to handle this. The idea is to also allow direct integration into Firebase to manipulate your data using your schema. We can then allow clients to edit their data directly without worrying about bad data.
